title: Ticketing App
description: This is a ticketting app for a fictional IT company to assign tickets submitted by users

title: Holiday accomodation booking app
description: This is an AirBNB clone called EasyHolidays where people can book holiday homes

title: Blog API
description: This is a backend API for a blog, with authentication and authorization with JWT. Basic UI to interact with API in demo link

title: Car ordering app API
description: This is a backend API for a real-time fictional car booking app. Customers can book a ride and drivers can accept if no current trip. No interface

title: Eventful API
description: This is a backend API for an event management app where users can enrol in events and creators can create events. Basic interface in demo link to interact

title: Food Ordering App (in development)
description: This is a real-time food ordering application

title: Invoice App (in development)
description: This is an app for suppliers to track the invoices sent to their clients
